official_title: To provide for a demonstration project relating to treatment for drug abuse and alcohol abuse under the health benefits program for Federal employees.
subjects: Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

summary.text: Directs the Office of Personnel Management to conduct a demonstration project on the feasibility and desirability of including benefits relating to drug and alcohol abuse treatment among the benefits provided under Federal employee health benefit plans. Requires that certain numbers of standard metropolitan statistical areas meeting stated criteria be covered, including the area containing Portland, Oregon. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To provide for a demonstration project relating to treatment for drug abuse and alcohol abuse under the health benefits program for Federal employees.
